00119             {
00120                   try
00121                   {

00208             function                select_condition( $Start = false , $Limit = false , $Field = false , 
00209                                                                                     $Order = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' , $NativeTable = false )
00210             {
00211                   try
00212                   {
00213                         if( $Start !== false )
00214                         {
00215                               $Start = $this->Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );
00216                               $Limit = $this->Security->get( $Limit , 'integer' );
00217                               
00218                               if( $Field === false )
00219                               {
00220                                     $Field = $NativeTable !== false ? "$NativeTable.id" : 'id';
00221                                     $Order = 'DESC';
00222                               }
00223                               else
00224                               {
00225                                     $Field = $this->Security->get( $Field , 'command' );
00226                                     $Order = $this->Security->get( $Order , 'command' );
00227                                     $Order = ( $Order === 'ascending' || $Order === 'ASC' ) ? 'ASC' : 'DESC';
00228                               }
00229                               
00230                               $Condition = "$Condition ORDER BY $Field $Order LIMIT $Start , $Limit";
00231                         }
00232                         
00233                         return( $Condition );
00234                   }
00235                   catch( Exception $e )
00236                   {
00237                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00238                   }
00239             }

00271             function                add_security_fields( $Fields , $Values , $AddFields = 0 )
00272             {
00273                   try
00274                   {
00275                         if( $AddFields & OWNER )
00276                         {
00277                               $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00278                               $Fields [] = 'owner';
00279                               $Values [] = $UserAlgorithms->get_id();
00280                         }
00281                         
00282                         return( array( $Fields , $Values ) );
00283                   }
00284                   catch( Exception $e )
00285                   {
00286                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00287                   }
00288             }

00320             function                add_special_fields( $Fields , $Values , $AddFields = 0 )
00321             {
00322                   try
00323                   {
00324                         if( $AddFields & CREATION_DATE )
00325                         {
00326                               $Fields [] = 'creation_date';
00327                               $Values [] = 'NOW()';

00329                         if( $AddFields & MODIFICATION_DATE )
00330                         {

00374             function                compile_fields_values( &$Record , $AddFields = 0 )
00375             {
00376                   try
00377                   {
00378                         $Fields = array();
00379                         $Values = array();
00380                         
00381                         foreach( $Record as $f => $v )
00382                         {
00383                               if( $v !== '_no_update' && $f !== 'master_id' && $f !== 'master_type' )
00384                               {
00385                                     $Fields [] = $f;
00386                                     
00387                                     if( is_array( $v ) || is_object( $v ) )
00388                                     {
00389                                           $Values [] = "'".serialize( $v )."'";
00390                                     }
00391                                     else
00392                                     {
00393                                           $Values [] = "'".$v."'";
00394                                     }
00395                               }
00396                         }
00397 
00398                         return( $this->add_special_fields( $Fields , $Values , $AddFields ) );
00399                   }
00400                   catch( Exception $e )
00401                   {
00402                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00403                   }
00404             }

00436             function                create( $TableName , &$Fields , &$Values )
00437             {
00438                   try
00439                   {
00440                         $this->Database->lock( array( $TableName ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
00441                         
00442                         $this->Database->insert( $TableName , implode( ',' , $Fields ) , implode( ',' , $Values ) );
00443                         $this->Database->commit();
00444                         
00445                         $id = $this->Database->select( '*' , $TableName , '1 = 1 ORDER by id DESC LIMIT 0 , 1' );
00446                         $id = get_field( $id[ 0 ] , 'id' );
00447                         
00448                         $this->Database->unlock();
00449                         
00450                         return( $id );
00451                   }
00452                   catch( Exception $e )
00453                   {
00454                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00455                   }
00456             }
